name: Mow-A-Mole
description:
What is the worst nightmare of every honest gardener ?

The terrible MOLES !
Crunch it, Slice it, Mow it !
MOW THE MOLES !

But don't forget to make your garden beautiful.

Made with qFrct, Vincent Cucheval and Zilast.

Source code: https://github.com/TeamSpatch/MowAMole
